text: Soni mwasoomelani abali ja Nuhu, ndema jajwatite kwa wandu wakwe: “E wandu wangu! Nakuwaga kukunsakalisya kutama kwangu (nomwe) ni kumbusya kwangu ma Aya ga Allah, basi kwa Allah njegamiile, basi songanganyani malindi genu pamo ni akwawanganya wenu (ni Allah), soni malindi genugo gakawa gakusisika kukwenu, kaneko ni mpitisye chilamusi chenu kukwangu soni nkamba lipesa.”
